org.matsim.core.utils.charts

Class ChartUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.core.utils.charts.ChartUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarChart, LineChart, StackedBarChart, XYLineChart, XYScatterChart

    public abstract class ChartUtil
extends Object
    An abstract class to simplify the creation of JFreeCharts.
    Author:
    mrieser, ychen

      • getChart

        public abstract org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart getChart()

      • saveAsPng

        public void saveAsPng(String filename,
                      int width,
                      int height)
        Stores the chart as PNG image file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the resulting PNG file.
        width - The width of the chart.
        height - The height of the chart.

      • addMatsimLogo

        public void addMatsimLogo()
        Adds the MATSim Logo in the lower right corner of the chart.

      • addDefaultFormatting

        protected void addDefaultFormatting()
        Adds default formatting options for the charts, like a white background etc. Requires the member chart to be set by the overriding class!
